Text: Agenda for NARG meeting January pst Hello This is a reminder for the upcoming North American Regional Gas model user meeting to be held in Sacramento California on January and Attached is a draft agenda for your perusal We have also attached a list of hotels close to the meeting facilities that may be of some help to you We currently have about participants signed up to attend the meeting It is not too late to RSVP for the NARG meeting if you are interested in attending please contact us as soon as possible to help us plan the meeting We still have a few open slots for presentations if you would like to make a presentation please let us know so we can include you on the agenda If you are already signed up to make a presentation we would appreciate it if you could send us a copy of the presentation so we can have copies available for the attendees If not please have approximately copies of your presentation at the meeting Please feel free to contact us if you have any suggestions or questions Thank You Pamela Yoo NARG Model User Group Meeting Agendadraftdoc

NARG user meeting in Sacramento Californiapst December Hello My name is Pamela Yoo with the California Energy Commission here in Sacramento California I sent out invitations about a week ago for the upcoming North American Regional Gas Model User Meeting that will be held in our area on January I have not received any information on whether you will be attending this meeting or not and I would like to encourage you to let us know as soon as possible I have attached the original invitation letter to this email for your convenience You may send in your information via fax the fax number is written on the form of the following attachment or email InviteLetterdoc
